title: convert snake_case keyed map to camelCase keyed map in elixir, phoenix before sending stuff as JSON
body:
Many don't know that this is built-into Elixir:

iex> Macro.underscore "SAPExample"
"sap_example"

iex> Macro.camelize "sap_example"
"SapExample"

iex> Macro.camelize "hello_10"
"Hello10"

See Docs: http://elixir-lang.org/docs/stable/elixir/Macro.html#underscore/1

Implementation: https://github.com/elixir-lang/elixir/blob/master/lib/elixir/lib/macro.ex#L1192
